description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin & Chickpea Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Korma,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Pumpkin & Chickpea Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup long grain white rice, steamed (to serve)
1.2kg pumpkin, deseeded, peeled, cut into 4cm pieces
0.5 cup salted cashew nuts, roughly chopped (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until soft. Finely chop coriander roots and add to onion. Cook for 1 minute. Stir curry paste into onion mixture and cook for 1 minute or until aromatic. Add pumpkin, coconut milk and water. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Add chickpeas and cook for 10 minutes.
Roughly chop half the remaining coriander, reserving sprigs to serve and stir through curry. Sprinkle over cashews and coriander sprigs. Serve curry with steamed rice.
